name: h3
description: Introducing the 2025 Victus Vibe Blue Crayon Drop 10 JBB Baseball Bat, a game-changer for young athletes in coach pitch leagues. This USSSA 1.15 BPF certified bat is expertly crafted with a mid-balanced swing feel, making it perfect for players ages 5-7. The vibrant blue and black colorway complements its innovative design, featuring a ringless barrel construction that enhances the sweet spot's flexibility and responsiveness. Engineered with VXP Alloy, this bat promises increased pop and extended durability, while the micro-perforated soft-touch grip ensures superior feel and control during every swing. Elevate your young player's performance with the Victus Vibe, where technology meets style. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
